website_summaries.verdict: Warm, affordable, and designed for a dependably comfortable fit, though not especially thick. These colorful leg warming socks work especially well when paired with boots.
pros: Elastic holds leg warmers in place
Available in a wide range of colors
Worn from just above the knee to halfway over your foot
cons: We don’t recommend machine washing these

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost 5'4 and weigh a little over 180lb my legs are small but once you get above the knee my thigh area is larger. This fit perfectly with extra space if needed
customer_reviews.author: Emescia

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough and two different sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for over-the-knee leg warmers/socks. These are not the winner. First of all, I'm 5'6'' and these are barely over the knee...nothing like the picture. Secondly, they are two different sizes? One is clearly longer than the other. Terrible quality, not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice leg warmers
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice leg warmers....BUT they are not nearly as long as I thought they would be. To wear them properly they are not long enough to pull up over the knee unless you are a stick. I have pretty slender legs and right over the knee is about as high as they go. They either need more stretch or they should be made a little bigger....more stretch!
customer_reviews.author: KKS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect over the knee thick leg warmer
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for over my leggings, exercise leggings, etc. I needed a warm leg warmer for outside walks/workouts. These stay up over my knee, are thick, and warm. I bought the black and will be buying other colors. I'm 5'9 and they fit perfect. The shorted your leg the more slouchy effect you will have. These are good quality and look way better in person than the pic.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Haven

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, fit well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear for my Pole Dancing Fittness class to keep my legs warm and also protect my knees during floor work. I have bigger athletic legs as well as a 34 inch inseam so I was concerned they would not fit my calfs and or cut into my thighs or that they would not be long enough. I was pleasantly surprised! Very comfortable, fit well, stay in place, and cute as well.
customer_reviews.author: Murphdog

customer_reviews.title: For the inquisition!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my mage Inquisitor Lavellan cosplay! Love them so much. I am 5'4 and they go above my knees if they are on the pads of my feet. If the bottom is at my ankles, they reach mid-thigh. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: ElementZero Cosplay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Hold it’s Shape
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of these has no elastic in it so it stretches out to be wider then the stretchy part that goes over the knees. The elastic at the top bunches making it lay weird or require constant fixing. They are also shorter then pictured (I’m only 5’4), it’s impossible to keep the bottom under the foot so it’s boxy shape hangs above the ankle making these look like weird knitted pants without the top. Definitely wouldn’t recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: I like them except for the rubber band at the top. I couldn’t figure out what was digging into my leg when the rest of the warmer was comfortable to wear. Once I figured out is was a rubber band, I was able to cut it and it made a world of difference. They stay up fine without the rubber band- I wear them over my leggings and pull up just over my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Robitaille

customer_reviews.title: EXTRA LONG and WARM!
customer_reviews.text: These leg warmers are nice and very warm. I love to power walk in the morning regardless of temp! I wear leg warmers over my base layer and under my top layer. These leg warmers are extra long and when raised all the way up they reach me about mid-thigh (I am 5'4"). There is an elastic at the top, intended to hold the leg warmers up. I am by no means a skinny gal but also do not have overly large thighs however, I do find this "rubber band" a bit tight around my leg. So, I wear them just above my knee.
customer_reviews.author: HitesMites

customer_reviews.title: Very thick warm material!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have thick thighs and these fit. They are a decent length, but I am 5'7 and when pulled up to about 2 inches above my knee they start to get closer to the top of my foot and are just about long enough. So def worth it for anyone shorter.. But someone who was 5'8 or taller would only be able to wear them as knee high. Also could be good for dancers? I danced when I was young and this is just like some of the warmers I had back then.
customer_reviews.author: spetrecca

customer_reviews.title: They fit great
customer_reviews.text: I’m a boy with Bella fit legs , I love these. I even wear them over jeans with boots
customer_reviews.author: Alexx Doesmore

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the socks is good but the elastic band to hold them up above ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the socks is good but the elastic band to hold them up above your knees is a thin rubber band that cuts into the skin. I had to unseam them and cut the rubber band. Now the socks just fall down and have no way to stay up. The band at the top needs to be one inch wide or more, not the width of a thin rubber band.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Keep my legs toasty warm when I wear a nightshirt.
customer_reviews.author: Kim's choice

customer_reviews.title: Finally something for curvy girls!
customer_reviews.text: Any girl with substantial thighs basically has to wear a garter belt or knee highs. Well, not anymore! I'm 5'8 and 215 lbs and these are stylish and stay up great!! Highly recommend and I'm buying more. They stay up and look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: TryMe

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: One leg arrived completely stretched out in the tight part that’s supposed to keep it held up on your thigh. Rendering this pair utterly useless. I’ve worn it a couple times anyway by running a rubber band holding it up, but it looks ridiculous and cuts off circulation. So I ended up just throwing them away.
customer_reviews.author: Stopitlaura

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my legs warm on an air mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: These thigh high leggings are a lifesaver for me as I am paralyzed and use a alternating pressure air mattress which is very cold in the winter. I have to be cognizant of any clothing rubbing or breaking down my skin and these are warm, soft and roomy. They fit great and I have a 34" inseam. I did have to turn them UPSIDE DOWN because the elastic left marks on my thighs but that is now resolved!!
customer_reviews.author: K Fly

customer_reviews.title: Great find!!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and saw where some ladies said the weren't long enough so I was sceptical to purchase. I decided to buy the pink, purple and black. I'm glad that I didnt let some of the reviews sway my. I'm 5'7" and from my ankle they go about 3/4 up my thigh. They have an elastic band at the top to hold them in place. The colors are bright and vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: They fit both small and large legs
customer_reviews.text: Great!! I have been looking and looking! Quality big enough for my large 250 lb body lol I need some my was old and falling apart Thank you Thank you for making and selling leg warmers That will fit small and large legs all in one!!!!! Very nicely made!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: edith

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight Elastic
customer_reviews.text: The elastics on the top were so tight as to be uncomfortable around my thighs or knees. I'm a size 14. Don't recommend unless you are thinner than me. I don't wear "plus sized" clothes and they were still too small.
customer_reviews.author: SRR

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time purchased with problems- garter unraveling. First purchase with snags
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchased because I thought first time was a fluke. The garter has the rubber band exposed this second time- see pic. Seller said they will contact manufacturer. However in looking at reviews seems this problem has happened before. Returned. First item—-Looks like good quality but item is snagged in a couple of places. I didn’t remove from sleeve to inspect more thoroughly. Update- seller worked with me to resolve problem. Very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: TMarie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Love that these have elastic on top so they don't slide down constantly! Being 5'3", 115lbs and very skinny, I was worried they wouldn't stay up but they've performed wonderfully! Can't wait to rock these for REZZ
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Buyer BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I am a size ZERO, first time I tried these on they started to unravel ! What in the heck ?!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Too short!!
customer_reviews.text: It says it’s 27 inches long it’s actually only 23! 4 inches makes a difference.Guess I can use them for boots.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice leg warmers.
customer_reviews.text: These leg warmers are just what I needed. I am tall (5'11"), so although they did not come as far up the thigh as shown in the picture, they stretch to over the knee. They are thick, soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as part of an ice skating costume for my child. She is 4 feet tall. They are big on her (as in they fit her entire leg) but that is what we were looking for. They are thick and of nice quality and have held up to washing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cozy I love it. I would have given you a 5 star if you would have used elastic instead of a rubber band at the top. I took mine out & replaced with elastic much better feel ;)
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: On the slimmer side
customer_reviews.text: As described. Has elastic on the finished top part. It's folded over and it's snug. Bottom is not super big either nor too stretchy. I am small framed and have thin legs, I don't suggest for bigger sizes. Length is perfect and goes over my knee about 2 inches. I am 5'4". Color of the yellow isn't mustard, it's a little lighter, more like a marigold color. Super soft and decently warm.
customer_reviews.author: LemonKki

customer_reviews.title: They fit great on thick thighs!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I ordered a pair of black ones and they are super cute! I was kinda nervous about ordering them because I'm on the bigger side of thighs especially. But when I put them on the elastic band is tight enough that it holds up but loose enough that it doesn't hurt to wear them. I would certainly purchase again in another color. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hagberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - they stay up no matter what and are so soft
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say? They stay up around any part of my thigh, thin or thick, and they wear wonderfully. They're long enough to cover nearly my entire leg if I want them to. They're very, very soft. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: H. Killough-Walden

customer_reviews.title: NO ELASTIC ON TOP
customer_reviews.text: These only have an elastic on the bottom... Or it can be the top but it will cut circulation.. So they fall down as you walk. Thick and cute, but without staying up, not what I was wanting...
customer_reviews.author: mommymars

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The quality is wonderful and feels like it'll last. The only issue I had with it was that the elastic band was slightly too tight so I used a crochet hook and gently removed it. And I'll be replacing the band with one that fits me better. Will definitely order again, later on.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: WARM AND FUZZY, COMFY FEELING!!
customer_reviews.text: THESE FIT ABOVE THE KNEE, WARM AND COMFY, MY 2ND ORDER GETTING MORE COLORS. GREAT QUALITY!!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Koyama

customer_reviews.title: Get your needle and thread ready
customer_reviews.text: The top is held by a rubber band and some yarn poorly sewn over. The rubber bands were separated by days end of first wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect yoga socks
customer_reviews.text: best buy for the money on yoga socks and leg warmers. Buying a second pair. They also wash and dry in the machine perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: patricia daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great for short skinny legs
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10 and have long legs so sadly they dont go from my foot to my thigh it's only long enough to be up to my knee. It also is not very stretchy or wide , so definitely not for larger people
customer_reviews.author: Northcoastbarbie

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: These actually do their job in warming your legs. Mine definitely do not go up as high as the ones in the pictures and I’m a short girl, but I have thick-ish legs. They are cute and definitely above the knee.
customer_reviews.author: Danica Gillotti

customer_reviews.title: these are wonderful leg warmers
customer_reviews.text: these are wonderful leg warmers. they are well made, long and comfortable. They stay up with gentle band on my average sized legs. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: I love these leggings
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings,their perfect,they fit snug,comfortable,looks beautiful on the legs,they keep my legs warm & snug,I'm very satisfied with these leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Looses shape quickly.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice, warm material and great length but they become loose pretty quickly. I still wear them around the house to keep warm, but they fall down over my shoes most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Belair

customer_reviews.title: Great color and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love these - very warm! I've 6'3" and weigh 175# and they go over my bulbous knees.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Christopher Beebe

customer_reviews.title: "Elastic" is a heavy duty 1/4" rubber band.
customer_reviews.text: I like the knit material, and fit is good EXCEPT for the "elastic" that is really a heavy duty 1/4" rubber band, that cuts off circulation in my legs. I had to take them apart to remove the rubber band, and then stitch them up again. Will see how my alterations hold up in wear and wash. Serves my purpose of keeping legs warm during sleep, but I won't buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these. They are long enough to come up over the knee, or she can fashion them below. Nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Decker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leg warmer
customer_reviews.text: I love the color; the fit is fine - not very warm though; and there was a rubber band inside the top of the sock which was too tight; I just opened the seam and cut the rubber band out; fits fine; Love the sock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were SO useful for my recent trip to NYC
customer_reviews.text: These were SO useful for my recent trip to NYC. I was able to wear them over either jeans or leggings and it was perfectly sufficient for getting around with temps in the single digits and teens (F). I'm 6'4" and typically used them to cover the space between my knee high boots and the bottom of my skhoop skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P

customer_reviews.title: OK but one of them frayed badly at the top - Changed rating after interaction with seller
customer_reviews.text: One leg warmer sock is fine but the other one frayed at the top and it keeps getting worse. So one stays up fine, the other not so well. Disappointed. After a few back & forth emails, the company honored their 12 month warranty and reimbursed the cost of the leg warmers to me. They seemed genuinely concerned about the quality of their product. It's just too bad I got one faulty leg warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne E. Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Cozy warm
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the purple and they are great keeping my legs warm while wearing tights or with a short robe. They have been washed twice and holding up well. The elastic is a bit snug, so I keep it at the bottom. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: magic light

customer_reviews.title: Short
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice material, but not nearly as long as pictured. They do seem to be well made and would be warm. Might work better on a shorter person. The seller is awesome to work with...very flexible and understanding with my return.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: These are the bomb. I brought 5 pairs all in different colors. They work well and are sturdy. I wear these for my dance class and just because it’s cold. I get tons of compliments as well.
customer_reviews.author: ryan crews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when wearing a kilt.
customer_reviews.text: First of all I had no issues with the vendor. Items were shipped and received as promised. The Leg warmers themselves are well made and plenty long. (and warm) Perfect with when wearing a kilt on a cool blustery day.
customer_reviews.author: tselliot

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable over the knee
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They keep me warm and are very comfortable to wear. I go to the gym and I can easily slip them off for my workout and put them back on and be ready to go home and take my dogs out in the cold in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Got a run first time I wore them
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed because the ends of these legwarmers are very unfinished and one of them started running on the bottom the first time I wore it. It's too bad because these are long and warm. I really wanted to love them, but the quality is just poor.
customer_reviews.author: BSN student

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Theyre cute but not what I expected at all. They're at the knee, no higher for me because it just doesn't look right. They lasted one day. The tops became loose and frayed pretty badly, leaving strings everywhere. The idea is great. I wish i got what is in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria a

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I sort of expected they would be a little small even though reviews seemed to indicate otherwise. They fit above my knee a few inches but slide down a bit easily. They're warm though and great for my downtown commute in winter. I throw them on over my tights when I wear skirts to work.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: ... Amazon from other vendors which I returned bc of poor quality or because they were too tight
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered two other legwarmers from Amazon from other vendors which I returned bc of poor quality or because they were too tight. These legwarmers are nice and stretchy but stay put. They are warm and comfortable. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Flashdance
customer_reviews.text: I feel real eclectic when I wear these out. I love that they keep my legs warm cause my lazy behind doesnt want to put on real pants in the dead of winter. My only qualm is that they are fuzz magnet. but they are warm and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Kasss

customer_reviews.title: They are cute and extra long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. She uses a wheelchair and can't wear pants so these with her long skirts and socks help make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon2me

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm, great for taller ladies, gives flashdance flashbacks
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear a dress and heels for work so these are really just for the commute during winter months which they work great for. If you have larger thighs these will not go up as high so will scrunch up around the ankle but for me this is about function, not fashion. I'm only 5'2 so these are super long when worn just above the knee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my mom. She is in a wheel chair and can’t where pants. She also lives in Michigan where it’s cold. These are perfect for her to stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, not nearly as tall as in the photo though
customer_reviews.text: These barely go to my knees, but they are nice and thick, very comfortable and will even fit over the cast on my broken ankle. I am keeping them but they are not even close to as tall as they are in the photo, otherwise, I'd give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: T S

customer_reviews.title: very nice leg warmers
customer_reviews.text: I got brown. They are nice and thick I gave three stars because they are not as shown, unless you are 4” tall or less. I am 5’6” They go just above the knee, not to the thigh. They have nice elastic to hold them up
customer_reviews.author: pen💮

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item 3 weeks ago. I started to wear last week. The elastic side already rip off. It is bad quality. Do not buy this product. I pay more than the listing price before!
customer_reviews.author: fashion17

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality however it runs run.
customer_reviews.text: The leggings fit very tightly, they run small order a size larger. The quality it there the warmth is good just the elastic runs tight.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Minter

customer_reviews.title: Right price, thickness and length
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in a timely manner. The leg warmers are perfect... stretchable with the right amount of thickness. I'm 5'10 and the leg warmers come up to mid thigh. Just what I was looking for at a good price (last one I bought was $25).
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Not as long as they say
customer_reviews.text: They are only 21 inches long - NOT 27. The pictures made me think that they would slouch around my ankle and come up to my thigh. They barely come up to mid thigh when I have them start at my ankle. They must have taken the pictures on a child and not a full grown adult. I'm not overly tall either at 5'6". Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Threading is coming loose
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these leg warmers at the beginning but now the treading at the top is coming loose. Every time I pull or cut the string that's loose it's coming apart more....smh
customer_reviews.author: Lola505

customer_reviews.title: itchy
customer_reviews.text: Rough itchy material, not stretchy enough. Bought them for $9.99/pair. These would fit nicely on bony stick legs.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from neuropathy from a spinal cord injury. I often feel a cool tingling in my lower leg, particularly at night when I'm trying to fall asleep. It's often the part between the socks and the creeping pajama pants that feels the most unsettled. These leggings filled that space and provide enough pressure to settled the tingling.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice Leg warmers
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality, soft leg warmers. I think they will be toasty warm. I'm glad to have found brown ones. They come up quite high on my thigh. I'm 5'4". 136 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: G. Reuss

customer_reviews.title: Met my dreams!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was scared cause I thought it wasnt gonna fit my big thighs, but it more than fit it was 100%comfy. They were soft, warm and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: stephany

customer_reviews.title: Too tight to wear over jeans/leggings
customer_reviews.text: Bought based on reviews that said one could wear them over leggings or jeans. I am petite 5 2" 115p and they are too tight for me and don't go as high as shown in the picture
customer_reviews.author: spdebi

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for me, (a guy). I bought the wrong ones & I'm sending them back. And, will do so something this week. They are well made, just to small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Popsy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear in and out of work because I usually wear skirts . These are nice and warm and has helped on those cold winter days. In fact my co workers asked where I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: mary ann

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: There is one thick round elastic at the top for the tigh but it’s very tight! Only for kids or skinny people. Uncomfortable to take class in.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaH

customer_reviews.title: Leg Warmers
customer_reviews.text: These do an excellent job of keeping my legs warm when I want to wear a house dress at home in the winter and don't want anything tight around my waist.
customer_reviews.author: HomeDogBliss

customer_reviews.title: Brings me back to the 80s.
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I thought they were going to get here and I would be so sad. But they are exactly what I wanted. (I have to wear a leg brace for the next couple of months and one of my legs was sooo cold.) You saved me! tyty
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are precisely as they are shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect length... Then it is quite thick and bulky which is perfect... I highly recommend these leg warmers... PS... They are warm...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit over boots or just as leg warmers. Perfect for ballet or as a complement to my work attire. Great quality. I have three pair and want every color. These never go out of style.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Frost

customer_reviews.title: A little short, but elastic holds up nicely
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9" with a 36 inch inseam and these were a little too short in length for my liking. They hit my lower thigh, but were not long enough to go over my heel as in the image shown - they sit more on my lower ankle. There is elastic at the top which I really, really like as they keep the leg warmers up more effectively. A little more purple than the picture shows, but I am not upset about that. Overall, good product.
customer_reviews.author: McKaila v.

customer_reviews.title: stays up, warm
customer_reviews.text: they stay up and are warm. I bought three. they do bunch around the knee, but are easy to pull up and cover the knees. on cold nights, i even sleep in them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Alscher

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. The material is soft! Haven't had leg warmers in years
customer_reviews.author: Shawn1970

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy leg warmers!
customer_reviews.text: Leg warmers are nice and warm! Well made. A bit snug on my thighs but they still work for me.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jean Berry

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I have chubby legs & these leg warmers fit well. I like the looser look, and the Large was perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Anna D.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Itchy, and bizarrely-shaped. Big bell end at the bottom. And mine don't exactly match thanks to errant stitching. Giving them to charity.
customer_reviews.author: Kellikellibobelli

customer_reviews.title: They fit fine and did not pull to hard
customer_reviews.text: Just put them on and the seem popped. Already unraveling. They fit fine and did not pull to hard. Not great quality. I would like them very much if not for this. But dont expect them to.last long as they unravel
customer_reviews.author: Jody Prall

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't go down all the way/cover my feet like in the picture, but keeps my legs warm.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Good for figure skaters
customer_reviews.text: These fit over the heel of my skates perfectly. I’m 5’6” with an athletic build for reference. They do slide down a little when jumping/ spinning, but overall they stay up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Look great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I move to a colder climate and I needed something to keep the bottom part of my legs warm I think these will be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These leg warmers are loose enough to be comfortable and easy to put on, yet the stay In place on the legs. Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I have thick thighs and these fit easily, mostly stayed put, and are so warm and fun. Best used for casual attire, or around the house, rather than dancing. They slide down for dance class, but are fine for warming up or playing at home.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Brown

customer_reviews.title: ill fitting
customer_reviews.text: The legwarmers are too short for "above the knee". They ride high in the ankle. The elastic on the top feels like an add in because they would not stay up without it. Best to spend a few more dollars and get something which is designed properly.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Galante

customer_reviews.title: Other than that the texture and the color are great.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping they'd be a bit longer; if I don't have them under my foot I can just get them to the top of my thigh, and I'm short. But they truly are as advertised: over knee high. Other than that the texture and the color are great.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Very warm alternative to nylons
customer_reviews.text: Knee high socks. Kept my legs warm and stylish. I hate pants but, its still too cold for nylons. These were perfect. Definitely turned a lot of heads in my conservative town.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Rodriguez Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I wear them around my calf because it don’t really like them hugging the back of my knees. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: Nae' Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love , Love , Love !
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much I went right back on Amazon ordered two more pair in other colors ! They stay up and keep my legs so warm !
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I thought they would go higher
customer_reviews.text: They are ok. They are warm but they don’t go All the way up my leg, they come to right above my knee and they slide down on my way to work. They kept my calves warm. The picture shows that they go higher.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Does the job when my legs are cold. Some reviews complained that is slipped down, but that's not the case is you put the elastic end over your knees. The wide, loose end is supposed to be around your ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Dyslexic Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic leg warmers!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Great for extra warmth in the colder months. Stylish and comfortable! they stay up on the leg without slipping down throughout the day which is amazing. Great product. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle K.

customer_reviews.title: I really loved these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an experiment and now I'm happy to say that these will be regularly added to my wardrobe. Got so many compliments. They're cute and edgy. Super comfy. Not too tight around the thighs. They stay up no problem. Perfect addition to any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Blafemina

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These footless socks do stay up! I use them over leggings when it’s very cold and my jacket is too short. Very reliable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter

customer_reviews.title: Good for fashion, not for dance
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes. One day of floor work and they’re shredded. Granted the way I dance is hard on leg wear but I’ve had super thin ones last longer.
customer_reviews.author: SugarMuffins

product_meta.title: Leotruny Women's Winter Over Knee High Footless Socks Knit Leg Warmers
feature_bullets: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low
Great fit, nice and soft,the elastic bands at the top of the socks will not make you feel uncomfortable
The Necessity for the winter season when you go outside
One Size Fit Most Women and Girl. Nice stretch, and not too thick or too thin
